title: guys can i change my name to a korean name in euw ?
body: guys can i change my name to a korean name in euw ?

replies.body: Each region has its own set of special characters that are allowed.  You can find the list of special characters for euw [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752814-Summoner-Name-FAQ#h1q5).  Let me know if that clears things up!
